00034 using std::string;
00035 using std::vector;
00036 
00038 class Package
00039 {
00040 public:
00041   Package();
00042   Package(const Package* refPackage, string revision);
00043   ~Package();
00044   bool Save();

00046   bool Load(string filename);
00047   bool IsNewerThan(const Package* refPackage) const;
00048   string GetName() const;
00049   void SetName(string packageName);
00050   const Revision& GetRevision() const;
00051   void SetRevision(string revision);
00052   string GetSlot() const;
00053   void SetSlot(string slot);
00054   int GetBinaryCompatabilityRevision() const;
00055   void SetBinaryCompatabilityRevision(int revision);
00056   int GetNumSourceFiles() const;
00057   SourceFile* GetSourceFile(int fileNumber);
00058   bool AddSourceFile(SourceFile* file);
00059   bool RemoveSourceFile(int fileNumber);
00060   void ClearSourceFiles();
00061   bool RecordSourceChecksums(string storageDirectory);
00062   void AddUnpackInstruction(string instruction);
00063   bool DumpUnpackInstructionsToFile(FILE* file) const;
00064   void ClearUnpackInstructions();
00065   void AddConfigureInstruction(string instruction);
00066   bool DumpConfigureInstructionsToFile(FILE* file) const;
00067   void ClearConfigureInstructions();
00068   void AddBuildInstruction(string instruction);
00069   bool DumpBuildInstructionsToFile(FILE* file) const;
00070   void ClearBuildInstructions();
00071   void AddInstallInstruction(string instruction);
00072   bool DumpInstallInstructionsToFile(FILE* file) const;
00073   void ClearInstallInstructions();
00074   void AddUninstallInstruction(string instruction);
00075   bool DumpUninstallInstructionsToFile(FILE* file) const;
00076   void ClearUninstallInstructions();
00077   int GetNumDependencies() const;
00078   const PackageDependency* GetDependency(int dependencyNumber) const;
00079   void AddDependency(PackageDependency* dependency);
00080   bool RemoveDependency(string packageName);
00081   void ClearDependencies();
00082   int GetNumFeatures() const;
00083   FeatureOption* GetFeature(int featureNumber) const;
00084   void AddFeature(FeatureOption* feature);
00085   bool RemoveFeature(string featureName);
00086   void ClearFeatures();
00087   bool Fetch(InstallEntry* logEntry, string storageDirectory, bool force=false) const;
00088   bool Unpack(InstallEntry* logEntry, string storageDirectory, string workDirectory, int numProcessors);
00089   bool Configure(InstallEntry* logEntry, string workDirectory, int numProcessors);
00090   bool Build(InstallEntry* logEntry, string workDirectory, int numProcessors);
00091   bool Install(InstallEntry* logEntry, string workDirectory, int numProcessors);
00092 private:
00094   string mFilename;
00096   PackageDependencyVector mDependencies;
00098   FeatureOptionVector mFeatures;
00100   string mPackageName;
00102   Revision mPackageRevision;
00104   string mPackageSlot;
00106   int mBinaryCompatabilityRevision;
00108   SourceFileVector mSourceFiles;
00110   vector<string> mInstalledFiles;
00112   vector<string> mInstalledDirectories;
00114   InstructionSequence mUnpackInstructions;
00116   InstructionSequence mConfigureInstructions;
00118   InstructionSequence mBuildInstructions;
00120   InstructionSequence mInstallInstructions;
00122   InstructionSequence mUninstallInstructions;
